remarks.format: ## Remarks 请记住，对象将调用之间的状态保存。Remember that the object saves state between calls to . 如果应用程序用数据的流完成的它应设置`flush`参数`true`以确保刷新状态信息。When the application is done with a stream of data, it should set the `flush` parameter to `true` to make sure that the state information is flushed. 使用此设置时，编码器将忽略无效字节的数据块的末尾，并清除内部缓冲区。With this setting, the encoder ignores invalid bytes at the end of the data block and clears the internal buffer. 属于一个逻辑单元，如代理项对的高代理项的任何剩余处理的数据转换根据当前的回退设置。Any remaining processed data that is part of a logical unit, such as the high surrogate of a surrogate pair, is converted according to the current fallback settings. `Convert`方法旨在用于在循环中进行编码任意数量的输入，例如从文件或流中读取的数据。The `Convert` method is designed to be used in a loop to encode an arbitrary amount of input, such as data read from a file or stream. 它在固定大小缓冲区中存储编码操作的输出。It stores the output of the encoding operation in a fixed-size buffer. 如果输出缓冲区不够大，将引发异常但将填充尽可能多的空间，并返回字符读取和写入的字节数。 will throw an exception if the output buffer isn't large enough, but will fill as much space as possible and return the chars read and bytes written. 另请参阅主题的更多评论。Also see the topic for more comments. `completed`输出参数，指示输入缓冲区中的所有数据是否已转换并存储在输出缓冲区。The `completed` output parameter indicates whether all the data in the input buffer was converted and stored in the output buffer. 此参数设置为`false`如果指定的字符数，则`charCount`无法将参数转换不超出指定的字节数`byteCount`参数。This parameter is set to `false` if the number of characters specified by the `charCount` parameter cannot be converted without exceeding the number of bytes specified by the `byteCount` parameter. 在这种情况下，应用程序应使用输出缓冲区的内容或提供新的输出缓冲区，增量`chars`参数中指定的字符数`charsUsed`参数，然后调用`Convert`再次方法若要处理剩余的输入。In that situation, the application should use the contents of the output buffer or provide a new output buffer, increment the `chars` parameter by the number of characters specified by the `charsUsed` parameter, then call the `Convert` method again to process the remaining input. `completed`参数还可以设置为`false`，即使`charsUsed`和`charCount`参数是否相等。The `completed` parameter can also be set to `false`, even though the `charsUsed` and
